headlines.description: Udinese handed AC Milan's new coach Marco Giampaolo a losing start when a Rodrigo Becao header gave them a shock 1-0 win in Serie A on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Udinese stun AC Milan to hand Giampaolo losing start

headlines.description: AS Roma were held to a 3-3 draw at home to Genoa in their first game under  Paulo Fonseca on Sunday after giving away their lead three times.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roma blow lead 3 times in 6-goal thrilling draw

headlines.description: Bologna coach Sinisa Mihajlovic left the hospital where he is being treated for leukemia on Sunday to take charge of his team.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bologna's Mihajlovic leads team despite leukemia

headlines.description: Atalanta continued where they left off last season with a thrilling win in their opening Serie A match on Sunday over SPAL.
headlines.shortLinkText: Atalanta beat SPAL in thrilling away win
